description.hltext_display: Teams needed for Kimmett Cup
description.author: The Eagle
description.content:
Kimmett Cup
There’s still some registration room for teams interested in signing up for the third annual Kimmett Cup pond hockey tournament Jan. 22.
Organizers say registration is gaining momentum with 30 interested teams signed up so far, and the tournament accommodating a maximum of 40.
Teams play a three-on-three format and can choose to participate in either a competitive or recreational division. Games will be held at Mitford Pond and the Spray Lake rec centre.
Registration closes Jan. 4.
The cost for the tournament is $325 a team and includes jerseys for up to 10 players and three guaranteed regulation games, plus playoffs if qualified.
For more information check out lindsaykimmett.com.

description.hltext_display: IGSS ampliará cobertura hasta niños de 9 años
description.content:
Las autoridades del Instituto Guatemalteco de Seguridad Social (IGSS) revelaron ayer la intención de incrementar la cobertura de 7 a 9 años para beneficiar a hijos de afiliados, medida que se concretaría el próximo año.
Anterior Siguiente
Arnoldo Aval Zamora, gerente del IGSS, anunció la mejora de atención durante la inauguración de clínicas en la zona 5.
El funcionario expuso: “En los próximos 90 días podríamos tener también a los niños de 7 a 9 años cubiertos por la seguridad social”.
Posteriormente, explicó que esa meta deberá ser aprobada por la Junta Directiva, y espera que desde el próximo año se pueda continuar escalonadamente ampliando la edad de cobertura de los niños.
De concretarse esa acción, 160 mil niños se sumarían a la atención del IGSS.
Luis Alberto Reyes Mayén, presidente de la directiva del Seguro Social, inclusive fue más allá, y aseguró que “ojalá”, paulatinamente, dicha cobertura pueda extenderse hasta los 15 o 16 años, durante los próximos cuatro años.
“Las condiciones están, y para cumplirlo los recursos son importantes, pero también lo son nuestros activos fijos”, comentó.
La ampliación de la edad de 5 a 7 años —vigente desde el 30 de octubre último— significó la inclusión en la seguridad social de 174 mil niños y una inversión de Q55 millones cada año.
Con la extensión otros dos años, el costo sería “algo similar”, afirmó Aval Zamora, pero aún no se ha calculado el monto real.
Atención especial
En el IGSS de la zona 5 se inauguraron ayer 21 clínicas especializadas para atender a los hijos de los afiliados.
Reyes precisó que el costo del proyecto fue de Q12 millones, y que en un período de entre 60 y 75 días se abrirán otras clínicas en la zona 11.
El nuevo complejo de la zona 5 posee 12 clínicas de medicina general y de peso, talla, psicología y nutrición, entre otras especialidades.
Piden pago de cuota
Las autoridades del IGSS insinuaron en sus discursos y pidieron después en declaraciones que el Estado les cancele, por lo menos, la totalidad de la cuota patronal del 2010.
“Cumplir con el IGSS es cuestión de voluntad política”, dijo Mayén.
Después, el presidente Álvaro Colom comentó: “Este año vamos a cubrir la cuota patronal del Estado en su totalidad”.
El Estado de Guatemala adeuda entre Q14 mil millones y Q16 mil millones de todas las deudas en calidad de empleador.
No obstante, aún no se ha terminado de pagar la cuota patronal del año recién pasado.
Del 2009, ese monto es de Q76 millones, de los cuales se pagaron Q51.08 millones el 12 de noviembre último.
El pago fue por medio de terrenos ubicados en Antigua Guatemala, Sacatepéquez; Zacapa, Escuintla y la capital.
Según el acuerdo gubernativo publicado en esa fecha, el inmueble en la capital se encuentra en la 2a. calle 1-00, zona 10, donde ha funcionado la Secretaría Ejecutiva de la Comisión contra las Adicciones y el Tráfico Ilícito de Drogas.
Mayén recalcó que este ha sido “buen año”, ya que el Programa de Invalidez, Vejez y Sobrevivencia (IVS) crecerá 79 por ciento.
Afiliados consultados sobre la mejora coincidieron en elogiar la medida anunciada por el IGSS.

description.hltext_display: 武田薬は終日小動き、糖尿病治療薬をめぐる特許権訴訟ですべて和解成立
description.content:
武田薬品工業 <4502、株価 - チャート - 企業概要> は、前日終値を挟んで終日小動きの展開となった。２２日取引開始前に、同社と同社米子会社の武田ファーマシューティカルズ・ノースアメリカ社（以下、ＴＰＮＡ社）が、糖尿病治療薬「アクトス」「アクトプラスメット」「デュエットアクト」をめぐる特許侵害訴訟で、最終的に残っていた２社（Ｔｅｖａ社とＳｙｎｔｈｏｎ社）との和解が成立したと発表。この時点で、アクトス製品群について係争中の訴訟がなくなった。
同社とＴＰＮＡ社は、今回和解した２社と以前に和解していた９社の計１１社に対し、１２年８月以降に「アクトス」のジェネリック（後発）医薬品発売を許諾するとともに、「アクトプラスメット」および「デュエットアクト」のジェネリック医薬品の販売を計画している２社に対し、１２年１２月以降に発売を許諾するとした。
２２日終値は前日比変わらずの３９９５円。
［ 株式新聞ダイジェスト ］

description.hltext_display: 童年的偶像长大之后 80后的我们还能认识几个？
Tình yêu chân thành của mẹ đã giúp ba trở về với gia đình
description.content:
Ba đi sớm về khuya, thường xuyên ra khỏi nhà lúc nửa đêm, về nhà lúc gần sáng, rồi giải thích với những lý do mà chỉ cần hỏi vài câu là biết ra được ngay. Em thực sự không hiểu tại sao mẹ em có thể chịu đựng đến như vậy được, nhưng giờ thì em đã hiểu ra rồi. (Tran)Chồng tôi muốn có cả vợ và tình nhân
From: Pham Bao Tran
Em năm nay 20 tuổi và mới yêu lần đầu. Em không có kinh nghiệm làm vợ như chị, nhưng em có tuổi thơ là đứa con trong gia đình mà người vợ hết lòng yêu thương chồng con, hy sinh tất cả vì gia đình, còn người chồng lại đi có bồ bên ngoài. Gia đình em kinh tế cũng khá, ba mẹ em đều có cửa hàng riêng. Ba và người đó trước kia không đơn giản chỉ là ăn bánh trả tiền, mà ba em thực sự có tình cảm với người đó.
Mọi người chắc cũng biết việc chán cơm thèm phở thì người đàn ông không thể nào bỏ cơm được, còn đã yêu thực sự thì rất khó nói. Mẹ em lúc đó rất đau khổ và tuyệt vọng vì mẹ rất yêu và tin ba. Ngay thời gian đầu khi em và các anh chị họ nói cho mẹ biết, mẹ thực sự không tin và còn tìm cách để bênh vực ba và giải thích cho chị em em hiểu. Ngay cả khi biết rõ sự thật, mẹ dù rất đau khổ nhưng cũng không làm lớn chuyện ra, vì mẹ luôn nghĩ cho danh dự của ba trước dòng họ, bạn bè.
Trong khi chị em em kiên quyết năn nỉ mẹ "cho bà ấy một bài học" thì mẹ em khuyên can và giải thích đủ điều, lúc đó em thấy mẹ em sao mà nhu nhược đến thế. Mẹ làm ra tiền ngang (thậm chí hơn) ba, mẹ có sự ủng hộ của gia đình nội ngoại, vậy mà mẹ chọn cách âm thầm chịu đựng cho riêng mình.
Nhiều lúc em viết sẵn đơn ly dị rồi mang cho mẹ ký mà mẹ cũng chẳng màng. Ba đi sớm về khuya, thường xuyên ra khỏi nhà lúc nửa đêm, về nhà lúc gần sáng, rồi giải thích với những lý do mà chỉ cần hỏi vài câu là biết ra được ngay. Em thực sự không hiểu tại sao mẹ em có thể chịu đựng đến như vậy được, nhưng giờ thì em đã hiểu ra rồi.
Mẹ em bằng tình yêu dành cho ba và sự hy sinh qua từng ngày tháng cho gia đình đã giúp ba em quay trở lại với gia đình. Mẹ nói mẹ không muốn chị em em có một gia đình không bình thường, mẹ nói vì tương lai của chị em em, chúng em phải được sống và lớn lên trong một gia đình có cả ba và mẹ.
Mẹ em cư xử với ba nhẹ nhàng, rồi cùng với sự phân tích và khuyên ngăn của các dì, dượng bên ngoại em, nội em cũng sang nhà em nói chuyện với ba rất nhiều, rồi chị em em cố gắng chăm ngoan. Người đó thì dần dần lộ ra là con người chỉ đến vì tiền, vì được ba em yêu nên càng ngày càng lấn tới ức hiếp mẹ em. Ba em, một người biết suy xét, đã biết thế nào là thiệt hơn và đã trở về với gia đình em.
Chị My hãy nhờ đến sự can thiệt của gia đình hai bên, đừng đao to búa lớn, mà hãy nói chuyện thật nhẹ nhàng và dùng chính tình yêu, sự hy sinh của mình để giúp chồng chị quay về với gia đình. Đừng làm gì với người yêu của chồng chị, vì lúc này cô ấy đang ở thế thượng phong, cô ấy nói gì chồng chị cũng nghe, thế nên đừng để ý đến cô ta.
Em tin cuộc tình nào rồi cũng có những mâu thuẫn và nếu không thực sự sống vì nhau, người ta sẽ không vượt qua được đâu. Điều chị cần làm bây giờ là hãy kiên nhẫn chăm lo cho chồng con, em biết sẽ đau khổ lắm nhưng chị hãy cố gắng vượt qua. Gia đình nào cũng có những sóng gió, vượt qua sóng gió người ta mới biết yêu thương và trân trọng hơn.

description.hltext_display: 港股反弹后继续向上 早市续升133点
description.content:
相关标签： 中石油 中国人寿 港交所 中移动 建设银行
据香港媒体报道，港股于昨日反弹后继续向上，恒指中午收报23127点，升133点，成交310亿元(港元，下同)。
欧美股市隔夜上扬，美股更创近3年新高。港股今早高开45点，一开市重上23000点，之后最多升过167点。
长实(0001)报120.5元，升4.2元；和黄(0013)报81.40元，升1.00元；新地(0016)报131.2元，升1.80元；太古A(0019)报126.9元，升2.4元。
汇控(0005)报80.20元，升0.05元；恒生(0011)报131.3元，升0.5元；建设银行(0939)报6.95元，跌0.03元；中银香港(2388)报26.35元，升0.45元；工行(1398)报5.75元，跌0.02元。
中移动(0941)报77.1元，跌0.10元；港交所(0388)报179.10元，升0.30元；中国人寿(2628)报31.95元，升0.25元；中石油(0857)报9.99元，升0.08元。

description.hltext_display: USAID donates $75m to Lebanon's education system
description.content:
The US development agency (USAID) has granted Lebanon $75m to support the country's education system, The Daily Star has reported. The money, which will be provided over the next five years, will go to advancing student performance and teaching standards in public schools. USAID already operates the $11.6m Lebanon Education Assistance for Development project in the country and supports a range of scholarship programs for university students. © 1996-2010 by AME Info FZ LLC / Emap Limited. description.hltext_display: 童年的偶像长大之后 80后的我们还能认识几个
Tự nhiên sinh ra đàn ông đã thích cái mới lạ
description.content:
Đàn bà thích cái quen thuộc. Đã bao giờ đột nhiên chị nghĩ khác đi rằng hôm nay ta phải làm đẹp, để không chỉ đẹp trong mắt chồng mà mình còn đẹp trong mắt mọi người nữa? Cái yếu tố đấy quan trọng lắm chị My ơi, đấy chính là nghệ thuật giữ chồng. (Nga)Chồng tôi muốn có cả vợ và tình nhân
From: Nga Kieu
Hôm nay do khó ngủ, tình cờ tôi đã đọc bài của chị My và một số ý kiến khác của mọi người gửi đến, tôi xin được có đôi lời.
Trước hết tôi xin nói về mặt luật pháp: Luật pháp quy định chế độ một vợ một chồng. Thực tế luật pháp chỉ quy định về mặt trách nhiệm, thứ có thể định lượng được, còn nó không thể ràng buộc được hai con người về mặt tình cảm. Tình cảm là thứ luôn luôn nằm ngoài luật pháp và nó không có mắt, nó nằm ở trong tim.
Về mặt tình cảm: Khi cuộc sống vợ chồng đã không còn hấp dẫn với bất kỳ phía nào, cho dù là đàn ông hay đàn bà, tất yếu sẽ dẫn đến một trong hai hoặc cả hai sẽ tìm vùng trời riêng. Vậy chị đã bao giờ tự hỏi lại mình rằng có phải mình đã quá mải vun vén tổ ấm mà đánh rơi mất hạnh phúc không?
Chị đừng nghĩ rằng chị chăm chỉ việc nhà, chăm lo con cái, chồng con là đã khiến đàn ông nghĩ tới vợ. Mỗi con người là một thực thể riêng biệt không ai giống ai, có người đàn ông thì suy nghĩ đơn giản nhưng có người lại có nhiều đòi hỏi, và cái tình cảm ấy ở mỗi người nó cũng không giống ai. Do vậy tôi nghĩ rằng chị đã quên mất chồng mình như thế nào, mà chỉ đánh đồng chồng mình giống mọi người đàn ông khác (không phải là mọi người đàn ông cụ thể mà là hai chữ đàn ông nói chung). , đàn bà thích cái quen thuộc. Hạnh phúc là cái mà ta luôn phải biết tự làm mới lẫn nhau thì mới giữ được. Đã bao giờ đột nhiên chị nghĩ khác đi rằng hôm nay ta phải làm đẹp, để không chỉ đẹp trong mắt chồng mà mình còn đẹp trong mắt mọi người nữa không? Cái yếu tố đấy quan trọng lắm chị My ơi, đấy chính là nghệ thuật giữ chồng. Bắt chị ăn mãi một món thức ăn, liệu chị có thích không?
Tôi từng là người thứ ba, cũng từng ly hôn và cũng có một con trai. Tôi xin nói với chị như này, ly hôn không có nghĩa là chấm hết mọi thứ, ly hôn chỉ là chấm hết mối quan hệ vợ chồng chứ không chấm hết mối quan hệ bố mẹ. Đứa trẻ sẽ chẳng thiếu thốn tình cảm nếu sau ly hôn vợ chồng chị vẫn quan tâm thường xuyên đến con cái.
Con tôi nó không hề cảm thấy thiếu thốn tình cảm của bố sau khi chúng tôi ly hôn. Những định kiến, những suy nghĩ theo lối mòn sẽ khiến chị yếu đuối, tình cảm khi đã không còn, níu giữ chồng phỏng có ích gì? Ly hôn là kết thúc một quãng thời gian đã qua trong cuộc đời và mở ra một quãng thời gian mới sẽ tốt đẹp hơn nếu chị lạc quan.
Ở đây tôi không phải là cổ súy chuyện ly hôn nhưng tôi muốn nói với chị rằng ly hôn không hề xấu. Còn chị đừng níu giữ người đàn ông bằng cách chịu đựng, nó sẽ khiến chị phải chịu đựng mọi thứ khổ sở. Chị hãy nhìn ra ngoài kia, cuộc sống tươi đẹp thế, sao chị phải khổ sở vì những thứ không hay.
Nếu chị muốn giữ chồng, hãy giữ một cách thông minh, bằng cách làm mới lại mình, đừng quan tâm đến người kia quá nhiều. Chị hãy nhìn vào gương và nghĩ xem làm thế nào để mình quyến rũ hơn, đẹp hơn và đáng yêu hơn trong mắt mọi người. Chị đừng dùng cái quyền vợ do pháp luật đem lại để giữ chồng, làm thế chị sẽ càng đẩy chồng về phía người ta.
“Đàn ông xây nhà, đàn bà xây tổ ấm”, chị hãy suy nghĩ về điều này. Thời nay khác thời xưa, đừng đi theo lối suy nghĩ cũ mòn nữa, cần một chút thay đổi chị ạ, rồi chị thấy mọi thứ sẽ khác.
Chúc chị vui.

description.hltext_display: TomCo Signs Compromise Agreement With Avenue Group, Avenue Israel - Quick Facts
description.content:
(RTTNews) - TomCo Energy Plc (TOM.L) said it inked a compromise agreement with Avenue Group Inc. and Avenue Israel Ltd., or AEI, together known as "Avenue".
The compromise agreement, inter alia, terminates the farm-out agreement, the joint operating agreement and Addenda (Original Agreements).
As consideration for TomCo relinquishing its interests in the two Heletz Licenses, it will be issued, credited as fully paid, such number of shares as shall equal ten percent of the enlarged issued share capital of AEI.
All parties have released the others from all claims, obligations, debts and liabilities relating to the original agreements and the Heletz Licences and Avenue has indemnified TomCo in relation to any loss incurred by it in relation to the original agreements or the Heletz Licences.

description.hltext_display: PDH investiga mala atención en el Camip
description.content:
La Procuraduría de los Derechos Humanos (PDH) investiga malos tratos y faltas administrativas en el Centro de Atención Médica Integral para Pensionados (Camip), zona 12, del Instituto Guatemalteco de Seguridad Social.
Anterior Siguiente
Edeliberto Cifuentes, de la PDH, afirmó que el 4 de noviembre último empleados de ese lugar presentaron una denuncia contra el director del Camip, German Córdova.
“Investigamos la denuncia en referencia y aprovechamos para verificar la atención que se brinda a los usuarios y las condiciones del lugar”, dijo.
La denuncia refiere que el director trata mal al personal médico del lugar.
Once trabajadores de la PDH llegaron al Camip para entrevistarse con trabajadores y corroborar los señalamientos.
Aprieta las tuercas
En el informe de la PDH se especifica que el director del Camip explicó que esta situación se debe a cambios que ha implementado su administración.
Según Cifuentes, el director indicó que “ha apretado las tuercas a los trabajadores” para que cumplan con horarios y turnos de trabajo.
A este centro llegan a diario mil 400 personas a consulta de reumatología, ginecología, cardiología y traumatología, así como neurología, medicina interna, general, odontología, sicología, urología y dermatología.
Otras 2 mil 400 llegan a cambiar recetas, cuya medicina muchas veces no les entregan.

description.hltext_display: Christmas Village delights young and old
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 37 minutes ago Updated Dec 22, 2010 12:52AM
Ogden • On a frosty December Monday, families bundled up their children and headed to the heart of downtown Ogden to carry on one of Utah’s unique holiday traditions.
Magic was in the air as hundreds of lights decorated Ogden’s Municipal Park. Kids roasted hot dogs, marshmallows and chestnuts on open fires at Trudy’s Popp n’ Johnny Tractor Made Premium Ice Cream outdoor restaurant. Wide-eyed children waited in line for a chance to tell Santa what their Christmas dreams are.
And, on the grounds, 58 decorated little cottages, many of them celebrating scenes from Ogden, offered moving statues and nostalgic scenes of trains, log cabins, reindeer and ethnic holiday events.
“I’ve been coming since I was 3 or 4,” said Kellen Criswell of Ogden, who was introducing the Christmas Village to his daughter Bennett. “There is just the connection here to family memories and good times. I wanted to share them with my kid.”
Kathy Boardman, another Ogden resident, could relate. Her son came here for the first time as a 1-year-old and, though he now lives in Florida, he brought Boardman’s grandchildren back to the place of so many good Christmas memories.
This was the vision village founders Jerry and Maxine Green had of what this joyful holiday tradition might become. The couple took their 5-year-old son Tommy to Ogden’s big Christmas parade in 1961, a fun event that marked the start of the holiday season. But Jerry noticed Tommy’s disappointment afterward.
That night, Green came up with the idea of creating a Christmas Village in the heart of Ogden with free admission that would include the sorts of shops that Santa might have in the North Pole. The original cost estimate was $25,000, a price too steep for Green. So he began to approach town merchants with the idea and was greeted with an enthusiastic response.
Utah Power and Light donated electricity, merchants began building cottages, and on Nov. 23, 1962, the first village opened after the traditional holiday parade. It has expanded over the years but kept the original mission of creating a fun family atmosphere in a park filled with colored lights, magical displays and, of course, Santa’s castle.
Published Dec 21, 2010 11:30:02PM 2 Comments
Published Dec 21, 2010 05:54:49PM 1 Comments
Published Dec 21, 2010 05:29:39PM 1 Comments
Perry Huffaker, public ways and parks manager for Ogden City, estimates that the opening night, which included the Santa parade, opening of the village and fireworks, drew about 10,000 people. An estimated 9,000 to 10,000 children will wait in line to see Santa during the time from Thanksgiving to late December when he is in his house. And close to 50,000 will visit the park during the holiday season.
Putting the event together is quite an undertaking, given the fact that many of the cottages have moving parts and all have lights.
“We have a crew of four that works every night, Monday through Saturday, basically from Thanksgiving to Christmas, solving electrical problems and fixing moving parts,” Huffaker said. “They are well versed. It takes a little to keep that baby running every night.”
Judging from the crowds of happy families walking from cottage to cottage, sometimes stopping to buy hot chocolate from a vendor or warm themselves on a fire, the reward for the volunteers who make the venture work comes in the form of giggling children and parents taking time from their hectic holiday schedules to get a taste of the Christmas spirit.

description.hltext_display: 日立金が続伸、米社とレアアース生産で合弁会社設立へ
description.content: 日立金属 5486、株価 - チャート - 企業概要 は続伸し、一時３１円高の９９６円まで買われた。２１日引け後、米資源会社のモリコープ社（コロラド州）と共同で、ネオジム磁石用合金およびネオジム磁石を生産する合弁会社の設立に向けて、検討を開始することで合意したと発表。１２年３月期第１四半期（１１年４－６月）中には合弁会社の設立で合意する見込み。レアアース（希土類）生産のモリコープと組むことで、ネオジムを安定調達する。ネオジム磁石用合金製造会社を設立することで、安定的にネオジム磁石用合金を確保。ネオジム磁石製造会社の設立により、ネオジム磁石生産能力の拡大を図る。これにより、日立金とモリコープ社は米国内における鉱山からマグネットまでのサプライチェーンを構築。ＨＥＶ（ハイブリッド電気自動車）・ＥＶ（電気自動車）、風力発電、産業用モーター向け磁石の拡大する需要に対応する。２２日終値は２７円高の９９２円。［ 株式新聞ダイジェスト ］提供：モーニングスター社

description.hltext_display: 小偷现形记！《EVE：霸权》拾取系统全记录
description.content:
日游走于官方论坛，发现随着全球最大太空星战网游《EVE》最新资料片《霸权》正式上线的临近，各种扫描贴，询问帖，建议贴此起彼伏。相信大家都迫切的希望可以尽快体验正式版的《EVE：霸权》，不要着急，只有了解更多新版本中的系统和功能，届时大家才能在《EVE：霸权》中更好的展开宇宙翱翔之旅。
点此进入《EVE：霸权》专题介绍>>
http://www.eve-online.com.cn/TyrannisFeature/index.html
点此进入官方论坛，参与我们的讨论>>
http://bbs.eve-online.com.cn/forum-10-1.html
突然想起了《EVE》的拾取系统，之前大家是不是对于独吞团队辛苦刷死亡成果的人恨之入骨?是不是对于在激烈交火战场上大发横财的人怒火中烧?看到捡了大家东西却又一声不吭的人一定是怒发冲冠了吧。
在新版本《EVE：霸权》中，这种悄悄独吞财产、隐秘侵吞物资的行为将被公之于众，是的，想要独吞?准备以名誉为代价吧!
具体是怎么一回事呢?让我们一起来详细了解一下。
霸权版本新加入的物品拾取记录功能，可以让全舰队所有人看到任意其他成员的拾取记录，
不论是从何种所属的残骸或者货柜拾取，不论拾取者和查看记录者在舰队内的从属和职务。
加入/组建 舰队后，在“历史”栏下有一个“拾取记录”。
在舰队成员拾取物品约2分钟后，就将在该区域显示明细，包括拾取者、拾取时间、物品名称和数量。
默认的排列顺序是按飞行员名字排序的，也可以点击标签按其他规则排列，比如按物品名称：
最后，右键点击“拾取记录”标签，还可以把拾取记录导出到默认位置存为TXT文本：
看完这个新增的拾取系统，大家是不是都很欣喜呢，那是，有了它，谁还敢默默侵吞公家财产还不“吱”一声。
还有更多《EVE：霸权》攻略介绍和系统变动分析，大家不要错过了哦!

《星战前夜 EVE online》，简称《EVE》，是全球最受欢迎的网络游戏;称霸欧美网游排行榜三甲数年之久;支持数十万人同服，电信网通双线互联!
独特技能系统，离线轻松升级;宏大的经济系统带你领略宇宙华尔街;从蓝图到战舰，玩家全程参与互动。
完全自由的角色扮演，军人海盗任你选;任务探险考古远征……玩法多得挑花眼;联盟割据合纵连横，宇宙舞台精彩无限;刺激星战顶级PK，你敢来吗?

description.hltext_display: Sowchuk trying out for worlds
description.author: The Eagle
description.content:
Edge Mountaineers
Not only has Cochrane’s Erika Sowchuk of the Edge Mountaineers been named to the U-18 squad representing Team Alberta in the Canada Winter Games, she also headed to Toronto Dec. 16 for the International Ice Hockey Federation (IIHF) selection camp.
Sowchuk will be trying out for the national women’s squad competing in the IIHF world women’s U-18 championship tournament in Stockholm, Sweden, in early January.
Sowchuk is the first Mountaineer to earn such a distinction in the girls’ prep hockey program’s three-year history.

description.hltext_display: 《佣兵天下》12月29日终极封测 内容前瞻
description.content:
第三代网络游戏企业蓝港在线今日正式宣布，奇幻战争史诗网游《佣兵天下》定于12月29日12整正是开启终极封测!一场跨越21000年时空，蔓延诸大陆、多方势力纷争的旷世大战将要拉开帷幕!为了回馈广大玩家的厚爱，《佣兵天下》首次曝光了终极封测新增游戏内容，让我们一同感受佣兵世界的精彩!
佣兵天下官方网站：http://yb.linekong.com/
【终极封测运营白皮书】
《佣兵天下》目前研发完成度已趋于完善，本次终极封测将开放全新的佣兵任务、副本、佣兵团战、变形武器及海量Game-In-Game，也是在上市前接受广大玩家们检验的宝贵机会;所以希望通过本次终极封测和天下玩家展开紧密沟通，参与到游戏的测试中，我们也预料到玩家们会提出自己的看法和意见，我们自信的已做好了相关准备，在本次测试结束后，有机结合玩家们提出的优良意见，在产品上市前做好最后一轮完善;在这个剑与魔法交融的世界，新的战斗即将打响，敬请期待。
《佣兵天下》是蓝港在线历时3年打造的一款奇幻战争史诗网游，是根据国内同名的超人气奇幻战争史诗小说《佣兵天下》改编而成。该书围绕着以艾米为首的小佣兵团为了拯救创世神界，维护世界秩序的故事。游戏将在轻松幽默的游戏氛围中融入丰富的小说要素，用3D效果呈现出了神秘的艾米诺尔大陆，使玩家彷佛身临其境，感同身受。
此外，“改变世界的中国力量”作为《佣兵天下》的slogan首次正式的公布给诸位玩家，作为一款敢于创新、拥有独特风格、注重玩家体验感的中国原创网游，《佣兵天下》目前已经发行到世界上7个地区近50个国家，深受海内外玩家的好评!
使命召唤! 佣兵任务重温主角成长历程
《佣兵天下》深度还原了一个真实的佣兵世界，而游戏中最具“佣兵”色彩的无疑就是深受玩家喜爱的佣兵任务了。《佣兵天下》终极封测，将在游戏中重现原著经典情节，开放佣兵任务系统，注重培养佣兵成长体系，带领玩家重温佣兵王艾米的成长历程!佣兵勇士们，拿起你们手中的剑盾，迎接佣兵任务的挑战，终有一天我们也会拥有传奇的佣兵生涯。
邂逅英雄人物 亲历经典剧情
《佣兵天下》将隆重推出经典剧情副本，为佣兵粉丝们提供精彩纷呈的RolePlay(角色扮演)PVE体验，让诸位玩家能够与传奇英雄人物并肩战斗!与佣兵王艾米一道抵抗袭击海克村的雪狼;亲历险象环生的剑之领域;勇闯精灵洞穴，挑战传说中的精灵试炼……剧情副本将把小说中重要人物的英雄事迹逐步展现给各位玩家。同时，还将开启12个风格迥异的地下城副本供玩家组队前去探索、挑战!发掘未知神秘的宝藏，挑战实力强大的BOSS，伙伴们，让我们一起去探险!
三国阵营大战 演绎热血PK
《佣兵天下》将为玩家带来一种全新的“佣兵团战”模式，融PK、工会战、国战为一体，为您再现原著中波澜壮阔的史诗战争场面!驻地争夺，劲爽PK、万人国战，于刀光剑影中演绎热血豪情;更有各种威力巨大的攻防武器首次出现在玩家面前，将战争氛围演绎得淋漓尽致!各位玩家将在《佣兵天下》中体验到激烈的多人PK、公会建设以及驻地争夺、押送粮草等多重玩法，能够全方位满足各位热爱PVP玩家的需求!
武器“变形记” 推陈出新与众不同
在《佣兵天下》中，拥有一把酷炫到可以变形的武器将不再是遥不可及的梦想。武器“变形记”即将上映，华丽拉风的造型，独一无二的设计，超乎想象的属性，传说中的史诗神兵不仅能为你带来能力上的提升，同时在武器外形上也具有非常鲜明的特色，一件件看起来平常无奇的武器经过变形之后，便散发出了神赐的光芒!拥有变形武器的佣兵勇士，你的名字将被历史所铭记!
Game-In-Game 休闲玩法尽享欢乐时光
“在游戏中玩游戏”，Game-In-Game休闲玩法一直是《佣兵天下》贯穿始终的设计理念之一，终极封测将隆重推出全新休闲塔防游戏――“守护灵源之门”以及 “狩猎场”，精彩生动的休闲小游戏一直是《佣兵天下》玩家们乐此不疲的兴趣所在。《佣兵天下》将为玩家带来更多轻松惬意的Game-In-Game休闲玩法，更加注重游戏技巧，更加突出策略配合，相信一定会给玩家带来更加丰富的游戏体验。让佣兵们在激烈的战斗之余，也能享受到闲情逸致的欢乐时光。
《佣兵天下》将于12月29日下午14：00时正式开启终极封测，欢迎广大玩家前来参与!

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said.
Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".
Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.
He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."
He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time.
"We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."
On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."
He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

General : Over One Million To Benefit From Power Bill Rebate Next Year
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- A total of 1,068,000 domestic consumers are to enjoy an electricity bill rebate estimated at RM138.48 million next year, Deputy Energy, Green Technology and Water Minister Noriah Kasnon said Wednesday.
The move is aimed at helping the low-income group to reduce monthly expenses, she said in reply to Senator Datuk Fatimah Hamat in the Dewan Negara.
She said Selangor had the highest number of domestic consumers to benefit from the rebate, at 150,000, followed by Johor (126,000), Perak (114,000), Kedah (99,000), Kuala Lumpur (94,000), Kelantan (69,000), Sarawak (69,000), Penang (68,000), Pahang (63,000), Sabah (62,000), Negeri Sembilan (53,000), Terengganu (50,000), Melaka (36,000), Perlis (11,000), and Putrajaya and Cyberjaya (4,000).
Noriah said that between January and October this year, the government spent RM116.24 million on rebate for consumers.
She said the rebate was only for consumers whose monthly electricity bill was less than RM20.
-- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Business : MAS Ties Up With KLM
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Malaysia Airlines (MAS) and Dutch airline KLM are set to explore closer links with each other, including, greater connectivity, better schedules, more choices for customers as well as cost reduction.
As a natural extension of the current and successful relationship which has been in place for the past 11 years, the collaboration via the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding in Shanghai today marks an important milestone for both national airlines.
"Through this, our customers can benefit with greater connectivity, better schedules and enhanced products. With closer links, we will also be able to keep costs down. This will then enable us to pass on the benefits to our customers," said MAS Chief Executive Officer, Tengku Datuk Seri Azmil Zahruddin in a statement here, Wednesday.
The agreement was signed by Azmil and KLM's Chief Executive, Peter Hartman.
The MoU with KLM is significant as Malaysia is an ideal transit point for visitors from Australasia and Europe, Azmil said.
"We hope to be able to sign a definitive agreement soon, so to enable to further increase the passenger numbers from that region not only to Malaysia but to our destinations in Australasia," he added.
Commenting on the signing, Hartman said the partnership was an ideal opportunity to expand the number of Australasian destinations that KLM offers to its customers.
Both Malaysia Airlines and KLM operate daily Amsterdam-Kuala Lumpur flights.
-- BERNAMA
We provide (subscription-based)
news coverage in our Newswire service.

description.hltext_display: 《侠义世界》22日13点神侠、笑书双服狂欢开启
description.content:
《侠义世界》明日双服开启迎狂欢
万众瞩目的首个武林狂欢周将于明天下午1点正式拉开帷幕，届时《侠义世界》将会同时开启两组新服神侠(电信区)和笑书(网通区)，以便迎接四方侠客。在狂欢周中，玩家不仅可以和众多江湖侠客一起过冬至，过圣诞，跨新年，还可以参加狂欢活动领取各种丰厚的奖品。
首造武林狂欢周 六大活动high不停
《侠义世界》六大主题活动让你乐不停
22日随着武林狂欢周的开幕，《侠义世界》将推出六大主题活动，独具中国传统的“吃饺子、打围炉”，充满西方风情的“寻找圣诞老人”“圣诞狂欢节”，还有实惠多多的“全民送Q币”和“侠义兄弟”等都会让你在冬季的节日里感到浓浓的暖意。
圣诞送祝福 神秘礼包从天降
插图3 圣诞送祝福 圣诞狂欢卡限量派发
从12月17日开始，凡12月17日以后在侠义世界论坛送祝福板块进行了送祝福活动并且进行回帖，均可在参与后1个工作日内获得论坛"侠义守护者"通过站内信的模式发送的圣诞狂欢卡，进入游戏至京城NPC侠义大侠处输入卡号即可领取圣诞狂欢礼物。(该卡12月22日以后方可使用)
关于《侠义世界》
《侠义世界》是成都梦工厂汇集七年武侠网游研发经验，历时三年打造的革命性网游。游戏背景源自金古梁温等多部知名武侠小说，乔峰、杨过等著名的侠客魔头以及七色地狱等门派都集结于同一个世界中，通过电影全景剧情模式，推动故事的发展。在画面上采用了梦工厂潜心研发的全新即时动态引擎及虚拟环境互动技术，让一花一木都更显真实;同时，《侠义世界》具有经脉充穴、内外功心法修炼以及巅峰决斗、惨烈门派战等大量经典武侠元素，让玩家感受最正宗的传统文化。
首款电影剧情网游 伪武侠OUT 真江湖IN 还原纯正武侠!12月22日狂欢测试开启!

description.hltext_display: Acción Ciudadana señala fallas en la Presidencia
description.content:
Acción Ciudadana (AC) otorgó premios a las instituciones más transparentes y libres de corrupción, y en primer lugar se colocó el Ministerio de Ambiente, en el último la Presidencia de la República y en antepenúltimo la Secretaría de Obras Sociales de la Esposa del Presidente.
Anterior Siguiente
“Hicimos un ranquin entre 34 instituciones del Ejecutivo, y premiamos al mejor”, explicó Manfredo Marroquín, de AC.
“En Guatemala siempre destacamos lo malo. Unos cumplen muy bien y otros no lo hacen, y es importante reconocer a los que lo están haciendo”, añadió.
AC elogió a las instituciones más transparentes y premió, en primer lugar, al Ministerio de Ambiente, seguido de la Secretaría de Planificación y Programación de la Presidencia y, en tercer lugar, al Ministerio de Finanzas.
Marvin Flores, de AC, expresó: “La Presidencia de la República, la Secretaría de Ciencia y Tecnología y la Secretaría de Obras Sociales de la Esposa del Presidente son las instituciones que no ofrecen a la ciudadanía información pública de oficio, que por ley deben incluir”.
Édgar Rosales, vocero del Consejo de Cohesión Social, dijo: “La Secretaría Obras Sociales de la Esposa del Presidente cumple con todos los requerimientos de la Ley y se han atendido solicitudes que el público y periodistas han hecho. Respetamos el informe, pero Acción Ciudadana debería precisar cuáles son los aspectos que les causan duda”.
“De las 34 instituciones, 18 no cuentan con un manual de procesos o procedimientos”, aseveró Flores.
¿Más transparencia?
El ministro de Ambiente, Luis Ferraté, agradeció el premio y expuso: “AC busca construir un país más democrático y justo. Eso es lo que precisamente buscamos en el Ministerio: cero tolerancia a la corrupción”.
Pero, ¿hay menos o más transparencia que hace un año? Según Flores, sí, aunque en forma muy tenue.
“La transparencia ha mejorado este año en el Ejecutivo, pero poco. Lo malo es que siguen áreas grises como Consejos Departamentales de Desarrollo o el Fondo Social de Solidaridad”, aseguró.
“Los últimos en el ranquin no se creen el discurso de la transparencia ni institucionalizan la Ley”, afirmó.
El vicepresidente Rafael Espada indicó: “Hoy es un día especial para la visión que tenemos del país. AC se esfuerza en convertir en una obligación constitucional dar información. Gracias a AC por recordárnoslo”.

description.hltext_display: Business : MAS Aims 40 Per Cent Passenger Growth For India Sector In 2011
description.content:
NEW DELHI, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Spurred by the healthy rise in air traffic this year, Malaysia Airlines (MAS) plans to revamp its fleet and scale up operations to achieve 30 to 40 per cent passenger growth in the Indian sector next year.
After cooling slightly in the last two years, owing to global economic pinch, passenger volume picked up steadily this year, giving MAS an edge to better its performance than in 2009.
MAS Regional Senior Vice President for South Asia Azahar Hamid said over the past two years the carrier was "quite affected by the slowdown" but load factor had touched 80 to 90 per cent since last January, enjoying almost full flights daily from major Indian airports.
"For next year we are looking at 30 to 40 per cent growth rate in load. We are going very strong in India. Based on our market projections, traffic going out of India is very strong and positive," he told Bernama recently.
Currently, the national carrier flies to five major Indian cities namely Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Hyderabad and Mumbai with plans in the pipeline to tap into emerging second tier Indian cities.
As part of it 2011 ambitious expansion strategy in India, the carrier would revamp its frequency to its regular destinations.
MAS would commence two daily flights (at present one daily service) to Chennai, a major gateway to Malaysian cities.
It would introduce daily morning flights to Delhi beginning April, increasing from the current five-day weekly service.
This is in addition to the existing daily night flights.
Likewise, there would be daily services from Bangalore and Hyderabad to Malaysia in 2011.
In addition, MAS plans to mount daily morning flights from Mumbai, India's financial capital, to Malaysia, adding to the existing daily night flights.
"As planned, we are putting in additional 40 per cent capacity in India. Despite competition, we are mounting additional capacity because there is a steady demand for our kind of full air service carrier," added Azahar.
To meet passenger demand and tap the Indian market, with international passenger traffic growth at nearly eight per cent in 2010, MAS is gearing to revamp its fleet as well.
It would switch from the B777, used at present, and introduce the A380 aircraft to India by 2012.
"By 2015 we will be flying the youngest fleet in this region or in Asia. By 2012 the fleet of A330 renewed version will be coming into India," said Azahar.
-- BERNAMA
We provide (subscription-based)
news coverage in our Newswire service.

description.hltext_display: Gage named soccer’s top U-20
description.author: The Eagle
description.content:
Ethan Gage
Nineteen-year-old Ethan Gage of Cochrane has been named the Canadian U-20 player of the year for 2010. Gage, who plays defender-midfielder for the Vancouver Whitecaps FC soccer team, topped the voting amongst six nominees to win the annual award.
In Gage’s third season with the Whitecaps he started five of 11 appearances with 564 minutes of game time. He also kept busy this season with the Canadian national team program, including appearances with the U-20 squad at tournaments in the Netherlands and Spain.

description.hltext_display: Business : Malaysia Needs To Implement NEM Efficiently, Says Economist
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Malaysia needs to implement the New Economic Model (NEM) efficiently to help it face the impact of the continued global economic uncertainty next year, said RAM Holdings Bhd.
The rating agency has maintained the country's gross domestic product growth at 5.4 per cent next year on the excitement generated under the Economic Transformation Plan (ETP) roadmap, a key component of the NEM.
Its group chief economist, Dr Yeah Kim Leng, said Malaysia is still able to register positive growth and in the face of any averse impact following its pursuit of reform path under the NEM.
"It's a challenge. Next year we are embarking on a new transformation journey that can set the pace for higher long-term growth," he told Bernama in an interview here Wednesday.
Yeah said 2011 will be a challenging year as Malaysia moves to lay the foundation of the path towards becoming a high-income economy via the ETP roadmap as well as the Government Transformation Plan.
He said talking and discussions have to be replaced by action to enable the country to sustain an economic growth of six per cent annually to become a high-income nation by 2020.
"If there is no follow-through action, it will result in a loss of confidence," he said.
As the government has set its expectations, Yeah said, the delivery and implementation will be closely watched next year as they will set the tone for the rest of the decades.
"If the delivery is not up to the mark, it may draw unfavourable reactions from investors and they will not put Malaysia on their radars anymore," he said.
Yeah said despite the strong domestic demand and improving consumer and business sentiments, the key challenge is to sustain the confidence and outlook in terms of stable employment and income growth.
Besides focusing on the economy, he said, attention may shift to the possibility of a snap election as the economic conditions are favourable.
"The conditions are actually quite conducive for the present administration hold a snap election to seek a new mandate to undertake the restructure/reform and achieve the vision under the NEM," he said.
On the private sector, Yeah said companies will be challenged to find ways to sustain growth and look for new opportunities, especially those created under Budget 2011, 10th Malaysia Plan and ETP.
He said the government's focus on energising the private sector will help sustain the growth of domestic demand.
"The private sector is more encouraged with the appropriate policy environment and incentives to invest in Malaysia," he said.
On the negative side, Yeah said, Malaysia has to recognise the continued weak growth in advanced economies, particularly in the US and Europe.
"I think that will persist for the next few years," he said.
Yeah said Malaysia has to depend on large emerging economies like China, India, Brazil and Russia.
He said although exports are likely to be soften, the domestic demand will be sufficiently robust to ensure Malaysia's growth is on uptrend next year.
Yeah said inflation next year is likely to be at 2.5 per cent from -2 per cent in 2010 largely because of the subsidy rationalisation.
"Domestic demand will remain robust next year in line with overall economic conditions due to a steady income growth and employment, strong credit flows and no cutbacks in government spending," he said.
He said public spending will continue on projects under the ETP which will start next year.
Yeah said the key challenge now is to manage the 'hot money'.
"Leverage on these inflows to finance our long-term projects.
"If we can demonstrate that Malaysian growth prospects for the next few years are strong and sustainable, they will likely remain," he said.
On the ringgit, Dr Yeah said it is likely to breach 3.00 against the US dollar by the middle of next year in tandem with other Asian currencies which will also continue to rise, albeit at a gradual basis.
Meanwhile, Affin Investment Bank head of retail research, Dr Nazri Khan, expected the GDP to grow at five per cent for next year largely due to external factors which will dampen exports.
"Overall, we believe the economy is expected to slow down until first half of next year and may pick up in the second half," he said.
He said the early concern will be inflation as the US is exporting it.
"By printing dollar, you can see 'hot money' coming into commodities.
"It is not alarming yet but they are moving fast," he said.
Nazri said any inflation will likely be cost-push.
"I see more downside risk next year compared to upside risk," he said.
Nazri said the ringgit is likely to reach 3.00 against the US dollar by the first half of next year amid the weakening greenback due to dollar printing which will further de-value the currency.
He said a stronger ringgit will enable Malaysians to consume cheaper imported products and mitigate income gap between Malaysia and abroad, which indirectly will attract local professionals working abroad to come home.
-- BERNAMA
We provide (subscription-based)
news coverage in our Newswire service.

attention may shift to the possibility of a snap election as the economic conditions are favourable
Overall, we believe the economy is expected to slow down until first half of next year and may pick up in the second half
public spending will continue on projects under the ETP which will start next year
companies will be challenged to find ways to sustain growth and look for new opportunities, especially those created under Budget 2011, 10th Malaysia Plan and ETP
the ringgit is likely to reach 3.00 against the US dollar by the first half of next year amid the weakening greenback due to dollar printing which will further de-value the currency
any inflation will likely be cost-push
talking and discussions have to be replaced by action to enable the country to sustain an economic growth of six per cent annually to become a high-income nation by 2020
Malaysia is still able to register positive growth and in the face of any averse impact following its pursuit of reform path under the NEM
If there is no follow-through action, it will result in a loss of confidence
The private sector is more encouraged with the appropriate policy environment and incentives to invest in Malaysia
although exports are likely to be soften, the domestic demand will be sufficiently robust to ensure Malaysia's growth is on uptrend next year
The conditions are actually quite conducive for the present administration hold a snap election to seek a new mandate to undertake the restructure/reform and achieve the vision under the NEM
Domestic demand will remain robust next year in line with overall economic conditions due to a steady income growth and employment, strong credit flows and no cutbacks in government spending
If the delivery is not up to the mark, it may draw unfavourable reactions from investors and they will not put Malaysia on their radars anymore

a stronger ringgit will enable Malaysians to consume cheaper imported products and mitigate income gap between Malaysia and abroad, which indirectly will attract local professionals working abroad to come home

description.hltext_display: 弟の病名は何だったのか知りたい - 熱のある赤ちゃんを…
description.content:
弟（40歳）のことで質問させてください。
亡くなった母から聞いた話では、弟を赤ちゃんのころに銭湯に連れて行き、
何かに感染して（？）高熱が出たそうです。
その影響で、半身が若干麻痺が残りました。
ある程度は普通に生活できますが、
歩くのも足を引きずりますし、握力も片手だけかなり弱いです。
母から私が子供のころにたった一度だけ聞いた話で、その後
親子で死のうと何度も思ったと泣きだしてしまったことしか憶えていません。

description.hltext_display: Japan exports rise 9.1 per cent in November, but trade surplus shrinks
description.content:
TOKYO - Japan says its exports in November rose 9.1 per cent from a year earlier.
The Ministry of Finance says the value of Japanese exports expanded to 5.4 trillion yen ($64.4 billion). It says it was the 12th consecutive monthly growth.
But the nation's trade surplus contracted 55.4 per cent in November, marking the first decline in three months.
The ministry said Wednesday that exports to China, Japan's biggest trading partner, increased 18.3 per cent in November from a year earlier. U.S.-bound shipments grew just 1.2 per cent, while those to the European Union rose 10.1 per cent in the month.

description.hltext_display: 'Ndrangheta: estorsioni a ditte sull'A3, dieci arresti nel reggino
description.content:
da 53 minuti
(Ink/Zn/Adnkronos)
Reggio Calabria, 22 dic. - (Adnkronos) - La Polizia ha eseguito questa mattina dieci ordinanze di custodia cautelare nei confronti della cosca Bruzzise a Palmi. I soggetti sono accusati di associazione mafiosa ed estorsione. Le indagini condotte dalla squadra mobile di Reggio Calabria e dal commissariato di Palmi hanno fatto luce su episodi estorsivi nei confronti delle ditte impegnate nei lavori di ammodernamento dell' A3 Salerno-Reggio Calabria. Lo scorso mese di giugno erano finiti in manette 52 componenti della cosca Gallico, storicamente contrapposta ai Bruzzise, anche in quell'occasione per le estorsioni sull'autostrada.

description.hltext_display: Business : Malaysia's Significance As Source Of Outbound Tourism Improves In 2010
description.content:
By Manik Mehta BERLIN, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Malaysia is one of the countries in the Asia Pacific region whose significance as a source of outbound tourism worldwide improved in 2010.
This assessment is contained in the just-released "ITB World Travel Trends Report" by Messe Berlin, the agency that organises the world's biggest tourism fair, ITB Berlin, and its Asian edition ITB ASIA in Singapore.
Indeed, outbound travel is increasing at double-digit rates and will end this year well ahead of levels reached during the pre-recession peak year 2008, thus setting a new record, according to the report.
The outlook for further growth in 2011 is also looking good, the report maintains.
As the year draws to a close, a conspicuous attribute of this year's tourism traffic was the rise in outbound travel from a number of Asian countries.
Asia Pacific demonstrated that it has become one of the growth-engines of world tourism.
2009 saw a nine per cent decline in outbound trips by Asians because of the impact of the worldwide economic downturn.
However, the skies brightened for tourism with Asia outbound travel showing strong growth of 15 per cent over the first eight months of 2010, with an expected 14 per cent increase over 2009.
This, according to Messe Berlin's report, will set a "new all-time high" since volumes are expected to be four per cent ahead of the previous record year of 2008.
Besides Malaysia, the other booming outbound Asian markets in 2010 have been China and South Korea which posted 20 per cent growth rates.
Taiwan, Japan, Singapore and India also posted double-digit growth rates, the report said.
"These figures confirm the optimism that people were already demonstrating at this year's ITB Asia in October.
"Prospects are looking good for 2011," commented Nino Gruettke, Executive Director ITB Asia.
The ITB Asia, organised by Messe Berlin's subsidiary in Singapore, Messe Berlin (Singapore) Pte. Ltd, has become a leading trade show for all sectors of the Asia-Pacific travel industry.
In terms of destinations, 76 per cent of trips undertaken by Asians were to countries within the Asia-Pacific region while 13 per cent were to Europe and 10 per cent to the Americas.
Though the final figures is not available, Asia's market share as a destination for Asian travellers is expected to increase, given a 17 per cent growth rate.
However, the Americas (+20 per cent) are also proving to be popular for Asians this year.
Europe-bound traffic from Asia is expected to be around 8 per cent which, in absolute terms, translates as roughly 10.4 million trips by Asians in 2010, according to the report.
The 2011 outlook for Asian outbound travel is "very positive", the report predicts.
The region is forecast to grow further between six and eight per cent in 2011 in addition to this year's expected 14 per cent growth.
India is being considered a "star performer" in regard to its burgeoning outbound traffic.
Both China and India have the potential to develop into attractive outbound markets in the years to come.
At present, China is the world's 10th largest outbound market, just behind Japan.
However, by 2020, the number of outbound Chinese travellers could double while the number of Indians traveling abroad could grow five-fold.
This would elevate both countries within a decade to the world's top six outbound markets.
Professor Haiyan Song, chair professor of tourism at the Hong Kong Polytechnic University, is quoted in the ITB World Travel Trends Report as saying that several key factors would drive a dramatic growth in Chinese outbound travel over the coming decade, including the emergence of a large middle class which could afford to travel abroad and changes in visa regulations.
At present, most Chinese travel abroad in groups due to visa regulations (as well as for language and cultural reasons) but to Hong Kong, where no such rules apply, about 70-80 per cent of trips are made individually.
"In the future if there are no visa restrictions for travel to Europe and America, then I'm sure the percentage of individual (Chinese) travellers will go up significantly," he commented.
Moreover, any strengthening of the Chinese currency would increase purchasing power for outbound travel, he pointed out.
There are lessons in these conclusions for Malaysia's tourism planners who will have to increasingly focus on the Chindia factor in the future.
An important source of revenue for Malaysia would be medical tourism which is inherent with huge business potential that is expected to touch a mind-boggling US$100 billion in 2012, according to a Frost & Sullivan research study.
Medical tourism is growing at an annual rate of 20 to 30 per cent.
The Middle East is one of the latent source markets of patients, with some 20 per cent of healthcare seekers worldwide coming from the Gulf and other Arab countries.
India, Thailand and, lately, the Philippines are also vying for a slice of the medical tourism pie.
However, Malaysia also stands to benefit from medical tourism if it makes the right sounds in foreign markets, including the high-cost Western countries where healthcare costs are exploding and becoming unmanageable.
Indeed, many patients from North America, the U.K., and Europe are, increasingly, seeking complex surgical treatment in India and Thailand.
Despite its well-developed infrastructure for medical treatment and well-trained doctors, Malaysia has not been able to attract a lot of medical traffic.
"That is because Malaysia, unlike India and Thailand, is not on the radar of the Western healthcare sector.
That could change with an aggressive marketing strategy," says one German healthcare specialist who has been noticing Europeans headed for hospitals in Mumbai, Bangalore, Bangkok and elsewhere in Asia.
-- BERNAMA
We provide (subscription-based)
news coverage in our Newswire service.

event_or_fact.property: several key factors would drive a dramatic growth in Chinese outbound travel over the coming decade, including the emergence of a large middle class which could afford to travel abroad and changes in visa regulations.
Moreover, any strengthening of the Chinese currency would increase purchasing power for outbound travel

description.hltext_display: プリンセス天功の映画がモナコで３冠
Papá no estará esta Nochebuena
description.content:
Estos rostros son los de viudas e hijos de pilotos asesinados en ataques armados, uno de los oficios al que la obligatoriedad del pago de extorsiones ha convertido en uno de los más peligrosos del país, con más de dos choferes muertos cada semana.
Mujeres y niños a quienes se une el golpe psicológico de una muerte violenta y la dificultad de salir adelante. Viudas que en su mayoría se dedicaron a criar a sus hijos y no tenían oficio hasta la muerte de su marido, y que actualmente a duras penas obtienen unos quetzales lavando y planchando para comprar los alimentos diarios.
Terminan trabajando en buses
La Secretaría de Bienestar Social ofrece a estas mujeres un importe de Q300 al mes por hijo, durante un período de dos años. Sin embargo, el hecho de que muchos de los pilotos tuvieran más de una conviviente dificulta la entrega de los pagos. La lentitud del Registro Nacional de las Personas (Renap) en la papelería también ha causado que más de una haya tenido que esperar durante meses la entrega del monto.
La necesidad económica de estas viudas, con oportunidades laborales casi inexistentes y consiguientes reparos para comprar los útiles escolares, obliga a que los niños dejen los estudios tras la muerte de su padre y, en muchos casos, por ser hijos de pilotos, terminan trabajando en las camionetas.
Este es el caso de Laura Letizia Pérez, a quien la muerte de su marido, en el 2007, la sorprendió con cuatro hijos y ninguna preparación. Ahora uno de los niños ya trabaja como ayudante; otros dos también ayudan en las camionetas por la mañana.
Según datos ofrecidos por el Grupo de Apoyo Mutuo (GAM), 127 pilotos fueron asesinados en el 2010 —509 fallecidos desde 2006—; en su mayoría, por no haber pagado las extorsiones.
El mayor problema es que las autoridades retrasan las investigaciones. “La única salida es que investiguen los crímenes y que se empiecen a sentar precedentes, para evitar que se sigan cometiendo”, aseveró Mario de Polanco, director del GAM.

description.hltext_display: Sunrise Resources Concludes First Phase Of Drilling At Long Lake Gold Project
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Sunrise Resources plc (SRES.L) disclosed the completion of a first phase of drilling at its Long Lake Gold Project near Sudbury in Ontario, . All 6 of the pre-planned drill holes were completed successfully to test for extensions of mineralisation around and below the existing mine workings. The company said a further 3 holes were completed to test other areas of interest identified by its prospecting activities during the summer.
Drill core continues to be submitted for analysis and the results of the drilling and geophysics are expected during January 2011.

description.hltext_display: Universita': a Palermo nuovo 'Blocchiamo tutto day', previsti diversi cortei
description.content: Palermo, 22 dic. - (Adnkronos) - Nuovo "Blocchiamo tutto day" oggi a Palermo in coincidenza con la seduta del Senato per la discussione della legge Gelmini. Sono due i cortei in programma ed entrambi partiranno intorno alle 9: il primo da viale delle Scienze, dove la Facolta' di Lettere occupata e' una delle centrali del coordinamento studentesco e il secondo da piazza Castelnuovo, in pieno centro citta', dove confluiranno gli studenti medi. I giovani non hanno annunciato quali saranno i loro obiettivi, ma hanno solo fatto sapere che "saranno assediati i palazzi del potere'. Forze di polizia in stato di allerta.

description.hltext_display: 自分自身を愛する、大切にするって、どういう事ですか？ - 価値があると思う事
description.content:
自分がアダルトチルドレンという自覚があり、親子関係に問題ありで、
まず、親からの無償の愛を感じられないという思いが根底が有るので
今迄、人から受け入れられる為、突き詰めれば、愛情を求める為に行動を取って来た
という事が、本を読んで理解出来、自分の苦しさの原因が多少理解出来たのですが
では、自分自身を愛する、大切にする・・・という事がどういう事なのか解りません。
エゴをつき通して生きる事？とか、極端な事を連想してしまったり
体を休める事とか？、美容に気を付けるとか？、自分の気持ちに正直になるとか？
自分を大切にしたいのに、それがどういう事か解らないのです。
どなたか、ヒントを下さい。
ユーザーID：4311705250
お気に入り登録数：38
古いレス順
レス数：28本
1 2 すべて トピ主のみ(7)
タイトル
投稿者
もみじおろし
2010年12月15日 12:23
私もアダルトチルドレンと医師から言われました。
現在精神科に通院、カウンセリングを受けています。
私も「自分を大切にする」事がわかりません。
恥ずかしながら、トピ主さんのタイトルそのままのことを、カウンセラーに聞いてしまった事があります。
「自分の体を大切にすること。
自分の体を傷つけない。
酷使しない。怪我や病気にならないように気をつける。それが自分を大切にするということです。」とキッパリと言われました。
自傷に自殺未遂に色々と自分を傷つけてまいました。
でも、カウンセラーの言葉で、
私自身が自分の体をケアしないということは、私の親が私にしてきた事（虐待）と同じなのだと気づかされました。
私たちは生きていていい。
多分、そう認識する事が「自分を大切にする」第一歩なのだと私は思います。
ユーザーID：2526182544
クローバー
2010年12月15日 12:24
今、あなたは、とても苦しいとおもいます。でもね、あなただけじゃないよ。ネットで検索してごらん。いっぱい、いるよ。
かくいう私もそう。生きてゆきましょう。難しく考えすぎずに。
自分を愛する・大切には、私は、こう考えます。
「理由はいらない。わたしは、この世に存在していいのだ。」と思えること。
これが、親きょうだいに大切にされなかった人には難しいんです。
私も、まだ、毎日自分に言い聞かせ、自分で自分を洗脳中みたいなものです。
意識の中でだけ、親や兄弟の存在を薄め、自分を仲間扱いしてくれた優しい他人を頭に浮かべ、その人達の中心に自分を置き、
守られている、愛されているとイメージすると、自分も存在価値があるかもと次第になれますよ。
ユーザーID：1549578434
daichi
2010年12月15日 12:52
「自分の願いはなんですか？」
私は、うつ病になった時に、自分で出した答えでした。
他人ではなく。
自分は、どう思うのか。どうしたいのか。
愛されたいなら、自分はどのように愛されたいのか。
無理とか、有り得ないとか一切考えない。
まず、ちゃんと文章にする。
心の中なんだから、他人は関係ない。
漠然とした夢を語るのではなく
具体的な希望（お願い）を自分に出してみるんです。
言い聞かせる感じに近い。
絶対そこで「できない」と諦めない。
わがままやエゴだとしても、それを一旦取り除いて
とにかく、事細かく「どうしたいのか」を考える。
妄想に近いかもしれませんが
自分の理想をひらすら思い浮かべる。
それを現実に出来るかどうかを修正して
叶えてあげるのが、自分自身を愛する事につながるのでは？
主さんは「自分を大切にしたいのに」と言ってましたが
ぞんざいに扱ってしまうのでしょうか？
例えば、どんな風に？
傷つけてしまうのなら、傷つけないようにする事が
自分を大切にする事かと。
ユーザーID：5940134451
シェットブラ
2010年12月15日 13:20
それは未来の自分や未来に出会うであろう人たちに
会うための努力みたいなものかな？
自暴自棄になったり、自分の体を大切にしなかったり
目先の誘惑に惑わされたりしないでしっかり生きていく事だと思う。
名前も知らない異性に体をほいほいあずける事が
自分自身を愛する事だとは思わないでしょ？
薬や性欲や自分のわがままにおぼれる事は愛じゃないと思う。
そんな事をしていたら未来にやっと出会えた人たちが
その事実を知って悲しむと思う。
最終的にはしなくても良い別れを選ぶとしたら？
そして自分のした事で未来の自分が後悔しないように
生きていく事だと思う。
周りがどんなに自分を低く扱っても
「もういいよ」と最終的に自分を愛してあげられるのも
「彼らの言うとおりだ」と傷つけて大事にしないのも自分だと思う。
愛って周りの人を振り回すようなエゴではなく
自己満足の範疇で自分にやさしくして可愛がる事かもしれない。
えらそうな事ばっかりかいてごめんなさい。
判りづらかったらごめんなさい。
愛されなかったというより親が愛し方を知らないという事もありますよ。
ユーザーID：7135795346
涙(トピ主)
2010年12月15日 16:41
＞もみじおろし様 ＞クローバー様 ＞daichi様
まで拝見させて頂きました。参考になります、嬉しいです。
愛する、大切にするとは？と、小町でもトピを探したり
ネットでも読んだり、アダルトチルドレン系の本を読んだり
色々していますが、一瞬解るのですが、行動が伴わないというか。
私の場合は、親からの洗脳が有り、それが「自分を大切にしてはいけない」と
読み取れるようなモノだったので、自分を第一にしてはいけないみたいなものが
根深くこびりついていて、そこから脱する事が出来ない上、
自己卑下の暴言の嵐だったので、自分を受け入れられないというのも有り
人からの承認を受ける事で、自分の尊厳を保って来たのです。
信じられないかもしれませんが、「自分はダメ人間」みたいな否定的な言葉が
幻聴みたいに自分に降り注ぎます。
ですから、自分を愛するとは「自分を信じる事」なのかな？と
平原綾香さんのジュピターの歌詞を見て、フト思ったりもしました。
こんな簡単な事すら、私には至難の業なのです。
ユーザーID：4311705250
涙(トピ主)
2010年12月15日 19:10
＞シェットブラ様
ありがとうございます。参考になります。
お返事より、自分の事ばかり書いて申し訳ないのですが
少し前まで鬱を患っていて、
それを知らない親の病の介護をさせられ、更に暴言も振るわれ
結婚しない事なども詰られ比較され・・・
散々なのに、こういう親は、自分の悪事を棚に上げ（実際忘れている）
今となっては、娘を便利使い。
しかし、それに逆らう事も出来無いというか、自身が病を経験した事もあり
弱気になってしまって、より前向きに行動出来ない。
幾ら自分を愛そうと思っても、やはり自分一人の力は弱いのかな？とも
思ってしまったり。
でもやはり基本は自分ですよね？
皆様のレスに有った事を実践したいと思います。
ユーザーID：4311705250
あき
2010年12月15日 20:29
最新レス拝見しました。自分を大切にするとは、自分の心に芽生えた好きを肯定することです。素直ともいいます。例えば、趣味でいわゆるオタクといわれるような趣味で世間受け、異性受け、が悪いものでも、大切にしている方いますよね、あんなかんじです。他人からみたらくだらないものでも自分には大切、という感情をもつことです。トピ主さんは、遠慮がちすぎるのです。いい意味でわがままになるのがいいと思います。こんなこといって相手の迷惑にならないかな、とか、考えて自分の素直な「好き」とか「こうしたい」の感情を押し殺してしまっていますね。それを自覚して、自分を解放しましょう。自分に厳しく、は、やめて自分に甘く、でいいのです。
マッキーの「どんなときも」という曲に、♪好きなものは好きと言える気持ち大事にしたい、とあるのですが、端的に言い得ていると思います。
ですから、トピ主さんは好きなことをみつけて追求しましょう。低俗でもマイナーでもいいのですよ。

description.hltext_display: Metal-Sculpted Scenes
description.content:
Frank Plant Twists Steel into Works of Art
More: Art & Design Live Arts Design Modern
Print
94 Trends
0 Comments
Frank Plant is an artist who incorporates daily life into his welded work. This American artist’s wired sculptures are sure to hit home.
Using steel, Plant bends and welds wires into art that depicts everyday activities. From a day at the beach to hanging up laundry, the black and white sculptures are pleasant and refreshing to look at. For those who want something more unique, Frank Plant has also done some bizarre pieces. Check out Frank Plant’s work in the gallery.

description.hltext_display: Cobras dominating the courts at holiday break
description.author: Kelsey Hipkin
description.content:
Marina Janzen
The Cochrane High Cobras basketball teams are off to a great start in Rocky View Schools league play at the Christmas break.
Junior Varsity
The Cobras junior girls are looking to show what they’re made of after finishing in third place in Rocky View Schools league play last season.
The team earned two wins in a row going into the break defeating Springbank 65-20 Dec. 14 and Bow Valley Dec. 15 in a close 40-34 match.
The Cobras junior boys team is looking to better last season’s divisional silver medal and are currently first in the Rocky View Schools’ league.
The team ended the first half of the season with a 114-35 victory over the Bow Valley Bobcats Dec. 14 and a 85-43 victory over the Springbank Phoenix Dec. 15.
Coach Kris Neilson said the teams’ goal this season is to win divisionals and then zones.
In order to do that, the team will have to maintain long-term focus.
“I think we have talent, I think we have the ability and the depth and it’s now a matter of just executing that,” he said.
Cochrane High School Cobras forward Cody Chamberlin goes up and over Springbank Phoenix’s Matt Cowie during the game at Springbank High School Dec. 15. Photo by Jeremy Broadfield
Senior Varsity
The Cobras senior girls team was also two for two in their last two games before the break, beating the Phoenix 52-47 Dec. 14 and Bow Valley 68-48 Dec. 15, moving them to second place in league play behind Airdrie’s George McDougall High School.
The senior boys team are also sitting at second in league play and had a dominating 102-40 win over Bow Valley Dec. 14.
For the Christmas break the boys team is packing up and heading out to Palm Springs, Florida, to compete in the Palm Springs High School Winter Classic.
“In total, the season is the most challenging ever undertaken by a Cobras team, hopefully preparing us to compete for a provincial title,” said coach Jim Forrest in an e-mail.

description.hltext_display: 《西游天下》3000萌宠打造最强宠物军团
description.content:
人在西游飘，哪能不挨刀?在最最危难的时候，谁才是你最最可靠的帮手?没错，就是宠物!一只忠诚、强大的宠物，绝对是玩家西行路上最亲密的伙伴，更不用说由多只宠物组成的宠物军团了。《西游天下》3000宠物军团强势登场，不但形象可爱，更融合多种新潮玩法――不但能修炼、还童、生育，还可看家护院，搞怪打劫。
《西游天下》拥有数百种各不相同的宠物，天上飞的地上跑的水里游的，从可爱的玉兔宝宝、成双成对的比翼鸟到人见人爱的人形侍宠，还有你从未见过的神仙宝宝，就连小悟空和小三藏也可以通过各种途径收为己有。再加上不同颜色、不同造型的变异和二代宠物，《西游天下》中的宠物数量可达3000种以上，让你轻松组建史上最最强悍的宠物军团。
宠物如此之多，初入西游大陆的玩家又该如何选择?宠物类型各不相同可要擦亮了眼睛哦!战斗宠、合体宠各司其职――力量、法力型攻击侍宠配合强力攻击技能，在升级、PK中为主人冲锋陷阵，均衡、体力型侍宠则为主人提供强有力的保护和辅助。属性出众的强力宝宝甚至还可以跟主人血脉相连，融为一体同生共死。而且在《西游天下》中，玩家可是可以同时携带数只宠物的哦，任你随时选择召唤。
不过需要注意的是，每一只爱宠在成长的过程中都需要倾注更多的心血，技能的升级、装备的更替都能让你的爱宠更强力。甚至危急时刻的一块宠物口粮，都能激发宠物心中百倍的战斗力，为你带来丰厚的回报!就算是资质不够好的小宝宝也不要轻言放弃，只要你有耐心，不抛弃不放弃，他们也会用强力的下一代来回报你的爱心哦!
2010年双引擎自由切换网游《西游天下》，每人每月送80RMB!

description.hltext_display: restaurant owner faces tax charges
description.content:
10:16PM
The owner of two Logan restaurants has been charged with failing to turn over to the state several hundred thousand dollars’ worth of sales and payroll taxes.
Justin Hamilton, 31, owner of Cafe Sabor and Hamilton’s Steak and Seafood in Logan, was charged last week with four felony counts of unlawful dealing of property by a fiduciary.
Utah State Tax Commission investigators said Hamilton received several hundred thousand dollars in customers’ sales taxes and also withheld several thousand dollars in employees’ payroll taxes but failed to turn them over to the state and used them for illegal purposes.
"Our criminal investigation unit diligently investigates the theft and fraud of taxpayer funds," Tax Commission spokesman Charlie Roberts said. "The Tax Commission is committed to prevent perpetrators from unfairly profiting to the detriment of other business owners."

event_or_fact.property: Our criminal investigation unit diligently investigates the theft and fraud of taxpayer funds; The Tax Commission is committed to prevent perpetrators from unfairly profiting to the detriment of other business owners.

description.hltext_display: Autoridades incautan buzones de los Zetas en Alta Verapaz
description.content:
Las fuerzas de seguridad lograron ayer incautar 220 armas de asalto, entre las que se encuentran fusiles AK-47, M-16 y ametralladoras, y cientos de municiones, durante los operativos efectuados en Alta Verapaz.
Anterior Siguiente
El decomiso se logró en el tercer día del estado de Sitio en esa región, y expertos en seguridad señalan que se corroboró lo que por meses se mencionaba sobre el aumento de la presencia de narcotraficantes, en especial de integrantes del llamado grupo los Zetas.
Después de que las fuerzas de seguridad efectuaran 21 allanamientos en varias comunidades del referido departamento, se logró el decomiso de buzones supuestamente propiedad de los Zetas, que operaban en ese territorio.
Hasta anoche se habían contabilizado por lo menos 220 fusiles. El dato fue confirmado por el presidente Álvaro Colom, quien en rueda de prensa aseguró que desde que empezó la operación a la fecha se ha incautado esa cantidad de armas, y municiones.
Rony López, fiscal contra el Crimen Organizado y encargado de la operación, explicó que aún no cuentan con el dato exacto del arsenal, debido a que todo el equipo de escena del crimen aún trabaja en ello.
Las armas se encontraron en varios vehículos, en viviendas y enterradas en los patios de varias propiedades que fueron abandonadas por los supuestos narcotraficantes.
Además, el número de detenidos asciende a 14 y los automotores suman nueve y un camión.
El gobernante aseguró que los Zetas que se han asentado en Alta Verapaz no podrán salir de esa región, debido a que en las carreteras hay retenes policíacos.
Añadió: “Se está investigando el origen de una avioneta, ya que hay un empresario que la reclama, y se tiene sospecha de otras dos avionetas que aparentemente no tienen permiso para volar en el país”.
Las aeronaves se encontraron en un allanamiento en los hangares del aeropuerto de Cobán.
También se incautaron por lo menos Q500 mil, de los cuales Q300 mil estaban en una de las avionetas.
Hallan cuerpos
Entre los hallazgos también figura el cadáver de Francisco Leonel González Paz, de 55 años, quien fue secuestrado el sábado último y por quien los delincuentes solicitaban un rescate de Q200 mil.
La víctima fue localizada en la finca Chischujá, Santa Cruz Verapaz. Las autoridades aún buscan el cuerpo de otra persona que habría sido secuestrada por ese grupo armado.
Colom afirmó que se hallaron “dos cuerpos enterrados en un como buzón”, y en esa casa también se encontraron más de cinco mil tolvas con balas.
Extraoficialmente trascendió que se habían encontrado tres cuerpos más en otra finca.
Todos los allanamientos fueron avalados por el juez de Primera Instancia Penal de Turno de la capital, según López para garantizar la institucionalidad.
“En los operativos encontramos casas abandonadas, pero los delincuentes dejaron vestimenta como de las fuerzas de seguridad, entre ellas chalecos, gorros e insignias, con lo que consideramos intentaban burlar a las autoridades”, aseguró Colom.
Información
Por la mañana, en la colonia Carlos V, fueron encontrados en sacos más de 150 fusiles AK-47, más de mil tolvas, una gran cantidad de municiones y chalecos antibalas.
Los fiscales han obtenido información en el área acerca de que desde hace varias semanas un grupo de supuestos zetas habría ingresado en el territorio nacional con tal de mantener el control de las operaciones del narcotráfico.
Las primeras pesquisas demuestran que estos son apoyados por un grupo nacional que les ha brindado logística y conocimientos de la operación.
En el operativo participan 40 fiscales, 25 peritos de la escena del crimen de diferentes departamentos, 250 soldados y similar número de policías.
También trascendió ayer que en Honduras se ordenó reforzar la seguridad en la frontera, para evitar el ingreso de narcotraficantes que huyan de Guatemala.

description.content:
12.2 MM Views
389 Comments
The Ronit Baranga dishware is certainly something fit for ‘The Addams Family’ or ‘The Twilight Zone.’ Absolutely disturbing, it seems to have come from another dimension.
Known for his atypical sculptures, Baranga has branched out to the kitchen, applying his creepy creativity to the Ronit Baranga dishware collection. Made using clay and porcelain, his dishes and cups incorporate creepy body parts like fingers and mouths.

description.hltext_display: Nieuwe fietsroutesite
description.content:
MIDDELBURG - In 2011 start de Fietsersbond met de bouw van de digitale fietsrouteplanner voor de provincies Zeeland, Noord-Brabant en Limburg.
Dit zijn de laatste loodjes om te komen tot een landelijke fietsrouteplanner. Alle andere provincies gingen de zuidelijke provincies al voor. Alleen Groningen ontbreekt dan nog. De Fietsersbond is nu op zoek naar fietsers in Zeeland, die een bijdrage willen leveren aan de ontwikkeling van de routeplanner in de zuidelijke provincies. De digitale kaart die gebruikt wordt voor de planner wordt namelijk gebouwd met de inbreng van ervaren fietsers uit heel Nederland. Via een website op internet kan iedereen na een speciale instructie meedoen. Op de speciale website staan goede kaarten en een luchtfoto van de provincies waarop alle ontbrekende fietspaden ingetekend kunnen worden. Fietsersbond.nl/fietsrouteplanner

description.content:
(RTTNews) - Blackhawk Network, a subsidiary of Safeway Inc., (SWY) and a financial payments provider, Wednesday said that Tesco Bank partnered with Blackhawk Network to deliver a new range of gift cards to Tesco customers. Tesco Bank is fully owned by Tesco plc.
The Gift Card Store launched in over 600 Tesco stores across the . The range includes brands such as: iTunes, Cineworld, Next, Debenhams and Facebook. Blackhawk Network , a division of Blackhawk Network, operates in thonds of retail locations to bring consumers the convenience of buying high street retail gift cards in one location.
Blackhawk Network works with top supermarket, hypermarket, convenience, pharmacy, specialty and Internet retailers worldwide.
David McCreadie, Managing Director, Banking at Tesco Bank said, "The Gift Card Store is a natural expansion for us and builds on the success of Tesco's own gift cards by introducing other popular brands to provide a wider choice for Tesco customers."
Jim Strabo, Managing Director of Blackhawk Network , commented, "It is an honour to work with one of the leading retailers in the world. Tesco is known for offering its customers convenience and choice, and we have worked with them to include a range of brands we expect to be popular with customers."

description.hltext_display: Un trabajador resulta herido tras caer por el hueco de un ascensor a unos 15 metros en un hotel de Palma de Mallorca
description.content:
PALMA DE MALLORCA, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
Un trabajador de unos 40 años ha resultado herido esta mañana tras caer por el hueco de un ascensor desde una altura de 15 metros en el Hotel Sahara de las Maravillas, ubicado en la calle Canonge Mateu Rotger de Palma, según han informado a Europa Press fuentes de los Servicios de Emergencias del 112 y del 061.
Así, el accidente laboral ha tenido lugar a las 08.40 horas, cuando por causas que se desconocen, el trabajador de una obra ha caído en el hueco del ascensor y, aunque se encuentra en estado consciente, no se puede mover.
Tras recibir la alerta, el 112 ha puesto en marcha de manera inmediata el correspondiente protocolo de ayuda y ha dado aviso de los hechos al Samu, la Policía Nacional, la Dirección General de Emergencias y la Policía Local.
Al lugar de los hechos, también se ha trasladado una UVI Móvil del 061 que, en estos momentos, se encuentra asistiendo al herido.

description.hltext_display: How to Measure Your Space for Spiral Stairs
description.content:
Measuring for spiral stairs can be a tricky job, especially if you have never done it before. This project is a good one for anyone who is moving into a new home or remodeling their current home. Here are a few materials you will need, along with some steps that can help guide you through the process.
Tools and Materials Needed
Measuring tape
Pencil
Paper to record on
Step 1 - Measure Width and Depth
Begin by measuring both the width and the depth of the opening where you want your spiral staircase to be. Many times you will find that spiral stair cases come in kits, so you can round to the nearest size and accommodate the space. You will want to consider how many times you want the staircase to wind when you are measuring. This will play into the height of the stairs as well as the width.
Step 2 - Measure Floor Height
Then you will need to measure the actual heights. Here you have to measure the floor to floor height so that you will be able to plan out how often to turn the spiral as well as how high the stairs will be. Measuring this total space can help to determine how staggered the steps will need to be as well as how far apart in height.

description.hltext_display: Planning for Custom Iron Spiral Stairs
description.content:
Planning for custom iron spiral stairs can be a stressful task, especially if you have never done it before. If you are redoing your home or moving into a new area, planning for custom iron spiral stairs may be exciting. Spiral stairs are a great look to have in your home and outdoors because they are classic but also edgy when you do them in iron. Here is a quick guide along with a few tools and materials that you may need to help you through the process.
Tools and Materials Needed
Measuring tape
Pencil
Paper to record on
Step 1 - Measuring
You should start by measuring both the width and the depth of the opening where you want your spiral staircase to be. Then you will need to measure the actual height. Here you have to measure the floor-to-floor height. These measurements will be able to help you decide how often the stairs will turn, at what angle, how quickly and also the distance between each stair and the height of the case all together. Most of the decisions are based soley from these measurements that you begin the process with.

description.hltext_display: DIY Metal Casting Projects
description.content:
When it comes to the art of metal casting, there are many project that you can do on your own. Here are a few examples and explanations to get you started with this hobby.
Metal casting tools is one of the most popular things that people enjoy doing. They cast everything from hammers and screwdrivers used now, back to tools used in ancient times. You can choose to do replicas of historic tools to show off or keep them modern and practical to be used in your back yard or around the home.
Metal casting has become not only a hobby, but also part of the decor in homes. If you are new to this type of work you can choose to keep it smaller with projects like picture frames or even key chains. Or you can attempt to try something much bigger such as a bed frame. One major project that people like to do once they get the hang of metal casting is candle sticks or holders to used outdoors such as on a patio or deck. They are simple designs to learn and they can also be made a little bit more complicated so different levels can give it a try. If you have been doing this for a long time, you may be able to attempt something like a light fixture.
Furniture is another great metal casting project that you can do on your own. There are so many great things that you can make and one of the most popular are chairs. You can make chairs that are great for the living room or kitchen, or you can make some that are fit for outdoors and go well with the rest of your patio furniture. Chairs are a great project that works for both beginners and those who are more experienced because you can decide on your own how intricate you want to make them. For beginners, you can start with a simple chair with a straight up and down solid back. For those who are more experienced though, you can make the designs go up and down the legs as well as the back of the chair. The possibilities are endless. You can also move on to tables, which are especially popular as a metal casting project for outdoors. Many times people will choose to make their own metal patio tables with chairs to match. These projects are a little harder than tools or smaller pieces of decor, but they are also great for your home or yard.
Metal casting projects are great because you can do them on your own or with a group of people. They make great gifts, or fixtures in your home and you can save a lot of money. If you are interested in doing your own metal casting, there are several books, magazines and even classes that can help to guide you if you are a beginner. Or, if you have done them before and are looking for a way to step up your game and do something new, there are classes for that as well.

description.hltext_display: 박진영, 재범 2PM 탈퇴 “밝히면 다친다”
description.content: 가수 박진영이 자신이 키워낸 아이돌 그룹 2pm의 전 멤버 박재범의 탈퇴에 대해 방송에서 처음 입을 열었다.박진영은 21일 밤에 방송한 kbs 2tv 토크쇼 ‘승승장구’에 출연해 박재범의 탈퇴에 대해 “복잡하게 얽혀있는 일이었다”며 “밝히면 이 친구(박재범)가 다칠 것 같다. 그럴 땐 너무 힘들다”고 말했다.김승우 등 진행자들로부터 박재범의 탈퇴 이유를 묻는 질문을 받은 박진영은 “회사가 공식적인 입장을 발표했는데 더 얘기한다는 게 그렇다”고 말을 아끼면서 에둘러 당시의 상황을 설명했다.“어렸을 때는 실수를 저지르는 데 나 역시 어렸을 때 엄청난 실수를 했다”고 밝힌 박진영은 “요즘은 어릴 때 데뷔하니 문제 된다. 어린 나이에 부와 명예를 얻은 상태에서 터져버렸다. 사소하다면 덮을 수 있는데 너무 커서 아이를 보고하는 것과 대중을 기만하는 것 사이에서 갈등을 했다”고 털어놓았다.방송 직후 박진영의 이 발언을 두고 팬들과 누리꾼들은 다양한 의견을 쏟아내고 있어 박재범의 2pm 탈퇴 이유가 다시 한 번 뜨거운 관심을 모으고 있다.스포츠동아 이해리 기자 gofl1024@donga.com

description.hltext_display: 《洛克王国》――翡翠水母练级
description.content:
翡翠水母练级在哪练级？ 翡翠水母怎么练级？
杰诺斯浅海和亚特兰蒂斯都可以捕捉，建议去亚特兰蒂斯捕捉，捕捉到的是进化过的，也就是琉璃水母
10~16级
这个阶段比较悲剧，初始的3个技能，都是鸡肋技能，没多大用处，建议用带刷法，或者自己多吃点苦去刷刷蒲公英，卡卡鸟吧，
16~29级
16级进化了，在14级的时候学会了溶解技能，可以到杰诺斯浅海刷，内个，刷水母。。。哈哈~21级领悟泡沫力量技能，可以刷亚特兰蒂斯的水母，也可以去刷大尾鱼，这个阶段依然需要耐性和忍耐力。
29~36级
再忍耐2级，学会水之波纹，换地点，去刷暴角龙，35级学会毒汁针，再往里走，开始虐待布莱石。
36~45级
有两条路可以选择，一个是继续在里头虐待布莱石，还可以到火山里杀火鸟，基本上都很轻松。大家可以自由选择
45~60
内个。。别无他法，继续刷吧，或者也可以打火系BOSS。要有异于常人的忍耐力哦。刷到60就解放了，离胜利不远了。
60以后
60以后可以开始刷神殿升级，去秒土灵，或者去暗影神殿也可以，水母不怕毒，暗影神殿那帮家伙拿他没办法!
好了，就介绍到这了！！！

description.hltext_display: Important Points in Counterfort Retaining Wall Design
description.content:
When it comes to a retaining wall design, the points in counter fort are extremely important. Unfortunately this is not something that many people are aware of when they are building and they could potentially save you from a serious headache down the road. They typically are important because they will ensure that the wall does not collapse, giving you a peace of mind knowing that it is sturdy. Here are a few things to think about for your next project.
Protection from Soil
One of the main points of the counter fort retaining wall design is to keep the wall from caving in completely. Using counter forts helps to tie the base and the actual slab together so that any bending or forces upon it are reduced and do not cause the wall to cave. Another reason why this is so important, besides that the wall is stopped from slipping into the soil, is the weight of the wall. The counter fort design helps to keep the weight of the concrete wall from causing it to fall in or sink.
Base Structure
Building a strong base is another reason why this is so important. You have to have a strong foundation to begin with in order to build up further. So having this type of structure is important in making the entire structure strong. Having the points in counter fort retaining wall designs help to keep the bottom layer from sinking into the soil after being built and that in turn keeps the next layer from sinking down as well. This continues up ensuring that the entire wall is sturdy. This is especially important for those who are building on new soil or sand. When you have older dirt it is typically hardened a little bit or even if you have concrete under the wall. If you are building on a foundation though that doesn’t allow for a lot of stability, then this element to your design and building is extremely important to keep in mind.
When building anything it is extremely important to make sure that it will last a long time. Mainly you want to make sure that you get your money’s worth and that you don’t have to end up fixing the wall or digging it out of the sand or soil if it sinks in because you didn’t take the necessary precautions. Without this type of design and reinforcement, there is a good chance that you will have problems later on with your retaining wall. If you are considering a counter fort retaining wall for your own project, there are a few places that you might want to check out before you get started. You can look either online or in most hardware stores and speak to someone there that can help to guide you. Many times it is best to speak with someone who has experience when it comes to retaining walls.
